name: Amy's Place
short: Champaign LGBTQ+ bar (19+) — coming soon. Open 5pm–2am daily.
description: Amy's Place is a new LGBTQ+ bar in Champaign welcoming both the community and allies. The venue is 19+ and plans to be open from 5pm to 2am every day. Everyone is welcome in this inclusive space. As a new establishment, check their Facebook page for opening announcements and events.
notes: Coming soon. Phone: (217) 819-6102. Email: Amymyers75@gmail.com. Follow their Facebook page for updates and official opening date.

name: Anthem
short: 19+ nightclub in Champaign featuring a dance floor and late-night events.
description: Anthem is a 19+ nightclub in Champaign known for its dance floor, DJs, and energetic nightlife. It serves as a popular stop for students and locals looking for music-driven late-night events.
notes: Age policy is 19+. Check event listings for DJs and theme nights.

name: Central Illinois Friends
short: Community center and clinic services including HIV/STI testing, PrEP/PEP, counseling, and trans health navigation.
description: Central Illinois Friends supports the LGBTQI+ community, people living with HIV, and the general public through compassionate, personalized care. Services include sexual health education, HIV/STI testing, PrEP/PEP, safer sex kits, support for people living with HIV, trans health navigation, and a free counseling program for LGBTQ+ folks and their families.
address: 2112 E War Memorial Dr, Peoria, IL 61614
